text: SAP is hiring 200 cloud developers (Perl, Python, Java, Go, JavaScript, Ruby, Python) for cutting-edge SAP Applications projects using technologies offered by hyperscalers (e.g. AWS, Azure, GCP) in the following countries: --Bulgaria --China --Germany --India --Israel --Ireland --US View and apply on the corporate career site here: https://jobs.sap.com/search/?q=iaas&utm_source=HackerNews&ut...
